title: Update About Us page copy and feature highlights

requirements.summary: Replace brand story paragraphs in AboutSection with new warm, approachable copy about the studio's journey and devotion to craftsmanship
acceptanceCriteria: The About section displays both new paragraphs verbatim
The tone is simple and warm, not overly formal or high-class

file_operations.description: Replace the existing brand story paragraph content with the two new paragraphs: 'Our journey began with a quiet passion — to transform soft, textured fibers into enduring floral art. Each bloom is thoughtfully sculpted by hand, shaped petal by petal into creations that radiate warmth, charm, and individuality.' and 'As an emerging studio, we are devoted to craftsmanship, detail, and the beauty of slow creation. Every piece is formed with intention — a gentle balance of texture, color, and imagination — designed to bring lasting joy to any space.' Maintain the existing layout structure and styling.

requirements.summary: Replace the three stat highlights with new feature highlights: Hand-Sculpted Florals, Artisanal Craftsmanship, and Bespoke Creations
acceptanceCriteria: The three stat/highlight items in the About section show the new titles and descriptions exactly as specified
No references to '100% Natural Ingredients' or '50+ Curated Collections' remain
Layout and styling of the highlight cards remain consistent with the existing design

file_operations.description: Replace the three existing stat highlights ('100% Natural Ingredients', '50+ Curated Collections', 'Handcrafted with Care') with the new feature highlights: (1) Title: 'Hand-Sculpted Florals', Description: 'Every bloom is individually shaped with meticulous attention.' (2) Title: 'Artisanal Craftsmanship', Description: 'Created with patience, precision, and creative intention.' (3) Title: 'Bespoke Creations', Description: 'Custom hues and designs tailored to your vision.' Keep the existing card layout, grid structure, and visual styling unchanged.
